front.title: DRIP Entity Tag Authentication Formats & Protocols for Broadcast Remote ID

abstract.t: This document describes how to add trust into the Broadcast Remote ID (RID) specification discussed in the DRIP Architecture. It defines message types and associated formats (sent within the Authentication Message) that can be used to authenticate past messages sent by an unmanned aircraft (UA) and provide proof of UA trustworthiness even in the absence of Internet connectivity at the receiving node.
